HEADLINE:
Please find attached the Earning Conference Call transcript in respect to the Conference Call held on Monday, October 29, 2018 at 16:00 pm (IST).
The transcript of the conference call also be accessed at the website of the company at www.aavas.in

In compliance with SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015, we hereby inform that Aavas Financiers Limited will hold a Conference Call on Monday, October 29, 2018 at 4:00 pm (IST) to discuss with the investors the Financial and Operational Performance of the company for quarter and half year ended 30th September 2018.
